column4: I need some help with a WiFi problem on 7.10. Anyone familiar?
what is the issue?
kindly respond to me prefix with my nick or i will miss your responses
how do you determine of what you said, see the gateway and gateway sees your wifi?
what tool or command do you use to say it sees both ways?
okay, when you type iwconfig it shows as associated ? does the nic card gets an ip address?
what is the ip address you get from the AP dhcp server?
does your AP/gateway have a dhcp server?
you can try this command instead of using static...  dhclient wlan0  to acquire an ip address
i assume it was wlan0  ..use the name you get from iwconfig
its either wlan0 or eth0 or wlan1 or eth1 or whatever nic name
did it work?
pastebin  the result of your iwconfig
well how many interfaces it recognize when you type iwconfig.. also take the time to pastebin it, i am taking my time to assist you, so do your part
this is on same computer you are on? why do you need to have both nics activated?
okay lets do it like this.. type iwconfig  and tell me how many interfaces does it say it has wireless?
and if you type ifconfig , how many names show up? what are they?
when you type  iwlist eth1 scan  how strong is the signal from your AP..it should be listed
thats strong enuff..what is the contents of your /etc/network/interfaces ?
you are running wep or wap? can you disable that in your AP also?  see if you can connect in the clear first before going to encrypted
good, so its the encrypted part thats screwing things up ... stay encrypted..you dont have that many nosy neighbors right?
right..so go uncrypted for a while..
okay good luck
you're welcome, you can comeback and share your knowledge next time :)
